content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: green_wool
inventory=[{"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 4, "index": 16}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 12, "index": 24}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 38}, {"type": "cactus", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a green_wool, I first need to craft a green_dye and a white_wool. To craft a green_dye, I need to smelt the cactus at slot 42 into an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 42 to slot 12 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: green_wool
inventory=[{"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 4, "index": 16}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 12, "index": 24}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 38}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Next, I need to craft a white_wool using the string at slot 16. I will start by moving the string to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: green_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 3, "index": 16}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 12, "index": 24}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 38}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I need to place another string to the right of the first one, so I will move the string from slot 16 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: green_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 16}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 12, "index": 24}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 38}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Next, I need to place a string below the first one, so I will move the string from slot 16 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: green_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 12, "index": 24}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 38}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I need to place a string to the right of the second one, so I will move the string from slot 16 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: green_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 12, "index": 24}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 38}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: The white_wool has been crafted, so I will move it to an empty slot (eg., 14).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 14 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: green_wool
inventory=[{"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 12, "index": 24}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 38}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft green wool, I need to dye white wool using green dye. First I'll move the green dye from slot 12 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: green_wool
inventory=[{"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 12, "index": 24}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 38}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I'll move the white wool from slot 14 to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: green_wool
inventory=[{"type": "green_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 12, "index": 24}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 25, "index": 28}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 38}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I can craft the green wool by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
